naslov: Kuća 310 m2 prvi red do mora u centru Rogoznice (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se kuća na tri etaže (P+2) stambene površine 310 m2 u Rogoznici. Kuća je izgrađena na parceli od 593 m2  ima 400 m2 okućnice. Kuća se nalazi prvi red do plaže u samom centru Rogoznice. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja, 1. kata te potkrovlja, ima ukupno 6 apartmana, a svaki apartman ima terasu ili balkon te pogled na more. U prizemlju se nalaze dva stana. Prvi stan u prizemlju ima površinu od 83 m2, a sastoji se od halla, predsoblja, kuhinje, blagovaonice s dnevnim boravkom, tri spavaće sobe, dvije kupaonice, ostave, i terase. Drugi stan u prizemlju ima površinu od 22,3 m2, a sastoji se od kupaone, kuhinje i dnevnog boravka. Na prvom katu se nalaze dva stana približne površine od 40 m2, a sastoje se od halla, kupaone, spavaće sobe, kuhinje, blagovaone s dnevnim boravkom i balkonom. U potkrovlju se nalaze dva stana približne površine od 40 m2, a sastoje se od halla, kupaone, spavaće sobe, kuhinje, blagovaone s dnevnim boravkom i balkonom. Kuća se prodaje potpuno namještena, a svi apartmani u kući su moderno opremljeni i uređeni. Svi apartmani su klimatizirani, a postoji mogućnost grijanja na kruta goriva. Kuća je izgrađena prema najvišim energetskim standardimna te posjeduje energetski certifikat A kategorije. Svi apartmani su registrirani za iznajmljivanje u turizmu, a s obzirom na visoku kategoriju objekta i lokaciju očekivani povrat investicije kroz najam u turizmu je između 13 i 16 godina. Okućnica je potpuno uređena i održavana, te kultivirana ukrasnim mediteranskim biljem, a u sklopu okućnice nalaze se i 5 parkirnih mjesta. Na prostoru okućnice moguće je izgraditi bazen. Kuća je locirana uz samu plažu i iz svih dijelova iste pruža se pogled na more, stari dio Rogoznice, te obližnju marinu Frapu. Udaljenost do centra i svih komercijalnih sadržaja je približno 200 metara. Za sve ostale informacije molimo obratite se agenciji. House for sale on three floors (GF + 2) with a living area of ​​310 m2 in Rogoznica. The house was built on a plot of 593 m2 and has 400 m2 of garden. The house is located next to the beach in the center of Rogoznica, and it consists of ground floor, 1st floor and attic, has a total of 6 apartments, and each apartment has a terrace or balcony and sea view. There are two apartments on the ground floor. The first apartment on the ground floor has an area of ​​83 m2 and consists of a hall, hallway, kitchen, dining room with living room, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, pantry and terrace. The second apartment on the ground floor has an area of ​​22.3 m2 and consists of a bathroom, kitchen and living room. On the first floor there are two apartments of approximately 40 m2, and consist of a hall, bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, dining room with living room and balcony. In the attic there are two apartments of approximately 40 m2, and consist of a hall, bathroom, bedroom, kitchen, dining room with living room and balcony. The house is for sale fully furnished, and all apartments in the house are modernly equipped and decorated. All apartments are air conditioned and there is a possibility of heating with solid fuels. The house was built according to the highest energy standards and has an energy certificate of category A. All apartments are registered for rent in tourism, and given the high category of the facility and location, the expected return on investment through rent in tourism is between 13 and 16 years. The garden is fully landscaped and maintained, and cultivated with ornamental Mediterranean plants, and within the garden there are 5 parking spaces. It is possible to build a swimming pool in the yard. The house is located next to the beach and from all parts of it there is a view of the sea, the old part of Rogoznica, and the nearby marina Frapa. Distance to the center and all commercial facilities is approximately 200 meters. For all other information please contact the agency.
